description: This file defines base models and a protocol interface for connectors in a software project, including classes for normalized items, create results, and the base connector protocol with method signatures.

classes.name: NormalizedItem
classes.description: Represents a unified search/create item format across connectors, including id, title, url, type, and optional subtitle.

classes.name: CreateResult
classes.description: Contains a normalized item as a result of creating a resource.

classes.name: BaseConnector
classes.description: Protocol that all connector classes must follow, defining methods for OAuth, credentials validation, search, create, and listing collections.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] get_oauth_authorize_url(self, tenant_id: str, state: str)
methods.description: Returns an authorization URL for initiating OAuth flow.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] exchange_code_for_tokens(self, tenant_id: str, code: str, state: str)
methods.description: Exchanges auth code for tokens and stores credentials.

methods.name: bool validate_pat(self, tenant_id: str, credentials: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Validates personal access token/API key credentials.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] search(self, tenant_id: str, query: str, resource: str, page: int = 1, per_page: int = 20)
methods.description: Performs vendor item search and returns normalized results.

methods.name: CreateResult create(self, tenant_id: str, resource: str, payload: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Creates a vendor resource and returns the normalized creation result.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_collections(self, tenant_id: str, resource: str)
methods.description: Lists collections like projects or spaces supported by the connector.

ctags.name: create
ctags.pattern: /^    def create(self, tenant_id: str, resource: str, payload: Dict[str, Any]) -> CreateResult:$/
ctags.signature: (self, tenant_id: str, resource: str, payload: Dict[str, Any])

ctags.name: exchange_code_for_tokens
ctags.pattern: /^    def exchange_code_for_tokens(self, tenant_id: str, code: str, state: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
ctags.signature: (self, tenant_id: str, code: str, state: str)

ctags.name: get_oauth_authorize_url
ctags.pattern: /^    def get_oauth_authorize_url(self, tenant_id: str, state: str) -> Dict[str, str]:$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id: str = Field(..., description="Connector-specific unique identifier")$/

ctags.name: list_collections
ctags.pattern: /^    def list_collections(self, tenant_id: str, resource: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.name: search
ctags.pattern: /^    def search(self, tenant_id: str, query: str, resource: str, page: int = 1, per_page: int = 2/
ctags.signature: (self, tenant_id: str, query: str, resource: str, page: int = 1, per_page: int = 20)

ctags.name: title
ctags.pattern: /^    title: str = Field(..., description="Display title \/ summary")$/

ctags.name: type
ctags.pattern: /^    type: str = Field(..., description="Type, e.g., 'issue' or 'page'")$/

ctags.name: url
ctags.pattern: /^    url: str = Field(..., description="Link to the item on the vendor system")$/

ctags.name: validate_pat
ctags.pattern: /^    def validate_pat(self, tenant_id: str, credentials: Dict[str, Any]) -> bool:$/
